name: Broken Lands Village
description:
The real world no longer exists! I was trapped in this cursed Village made of inkblots on parchment. Every day I'm stalked by an assasin and stuck in a time loop. None of the residents remember me, although I myself have memories. I need to get out of here ASAP!

Discover the secret of the dark Village by exploring it every day in a time loop! Find out what the Shadow Council is and what their intentions are for Your soul. Explore objects, collect items and use them to keep moving forward and discover the truth. Have interesting conversations with the inhabitants of the Village. They certainly hide more than one secret in their minds. The end is inevitable. The end will be the beginning.

Key Features:

  • Time loop - In the morning, You wake up in the town square. You must use the time until midnight as efficiently as possible to collect informations, items, talk to characters and explore new locations. Midnight is the marker of the end and a new beginning. The only thing left is the knowledge and experience acquired, or maybe something more?
  • Soul Reflection - Discover mystical decision-making possibilities. Will you keep the light within? Will the darkness consume you?
  • Character Mood - Meet the inhabitants of the Village. Remember, however, that everyone can have a bad or better day! More may depend on this than you might think.
  • Day and night cycle - Watch the sky to approximately determine how much time is left until midnight. You are stuck in a time loop, so this is a very important issue. How much can you do in the time given to you? Check on your own
  • Diary - A few sheets of paper with a cover, but you can't move without them. Accumulate knowledge in the inherent object of every seeker of truth.
  • Items - Explore locations, maybe you will find something useful?
  • Clear interface - You no longer have to search the entire screen with the cursor to find an interactive object, as in other adventure games. All this type of stuff is marked with buttons.
